summary: WITH JUST 2,000 MILES ON THE SUV, THE DRIVER'S SIDE LOW BEAM HEADLIGHT BURNED OUT. REPLACED IT. AT 20,000 MILES, BOTH LOW BEAMS BURNED OUT AT THE SAME TIME. REPLACED THEM. AT 30,000, BOTH LOW BEAMS BURNED OUT AGAIN, AT THE SAME TIME. REPLACED AND CONTACTED DEALER WITH, SO FAR, NO RESPONSE. I'VE OWNED ALMOST 10 VEHICLES OVER THE YEARS - INCLUDING HIDS AND HALOGENS - AND HAVE NEVER HAD HEADLIGHTS BURN OUT THIS QUICKLY OR AT EXACTLY THE SAME TIME.
